row._WebConfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?><!DOCTYPE AB_VTR_NR [ <!ELEMENT AB_VTR_NR EMPTY > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR PLAUSI CDATA "NNNN" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR SEPPL CDATA "EIW" > <!ATTLIST AB_VTR_NR WERT CDATA "" >
<!ELEMENT BILANZJAHR EMPTY > <!ATTLIST BILANZJAHR BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "Mussfeld!" > <!ATTLIST BILANZJAHR PLAUSI CDATA "JJJJ" > <!ATTLIST BILANZJAHR SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST BILANZJAHR WERT CDATA "" >

<!ELEMENT Content ( PARAMETER ) >
<!ELEMENT KOLLEKTIVNUMMER EMPTY > <!ATTLIST KOLLEKTIVNUMMER BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "0=Nur Einzelverträge; -1= Alle Verträge; einzelne Koll-Nummer" > <!ATTLIST KOLLEKTIVNUMMER PLAUSI CDATA "FREITEXT" > <!ATTLIST KOLLEKTIVNUMMER SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST KOLLEKTIVNUMMER WERT CDATA "" >

<!ELEMENT RUN_AUSLOESER EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER SEPPL CDATA "E" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER WERT CDATA "J" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV SEPPL CDATA "E" > <!ATTLIST RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV WERT CDATA "J" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_BEARBEITER EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER SEPPL CDATA "E" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER WERT CDATA "J" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV SEPPL CDATA "E" > <!ATTLIST RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV WERT CDATA "J" >

<!ELEMENT RUN_SELEKTIERER EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_SELEKTIERER BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST RUN_SELEKTIERER PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST RUN_SELEKTIERER SEPPL CDATA "E" > <!ATTLIST RUN_SELEKTIERER WERT CDATA "J" >

<!ELEMENT TRACE EMPTY > <!ATTLIST TRACE BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "Ausführliches Logfile" > <!ATTLIST TRACE PLAUSI CDATA "J/N" > <!ATTLIST TRACE SEPPL CDATA "EIW" > <!ATTLIST TRACE WERT CDATA "N" >
<!ELEMENT UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "UC4-DEPLOYMENT-TEST J/N" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "JN" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "WIE" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "N" >
]> <Content> <PARAMETER> <UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="UC4-DEPLOYMENT-TEST J/N" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="WIE" WERT="N"/> <BILANZMONAT BESCHREIBUNG="Mussfeld!" PLAUSI="MM" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <BILANZJAHR BESCHREIBUNG="Mussfeld!" row.process:
:INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &BILANZMONAT#,,"BILANZMONAT [MM]",'',K :READ &BILANZJAHR#,,"BILANZJAHR [JJJJ]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02',K :READ &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER#,,"KOLLEKTIVNUMMER [FREITEXT]",'',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PARALLEL#,,"PARALLEL [1..100]",'2',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'NONE',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR#,,"RUN_GENERATOR [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_CTV#,,"RUN_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV#,,"RUN_GENERATOR_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &BILANZMONAT# = &BILANZMONAT# :PSET &BILANZJAHR# = &BILANZJAHR# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# = &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &PARALLEL# = &PARALLEL# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER# = &RUN_AUSLOESER# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR# = &RUN_GENERATOR# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# :PSET &RUN_CTV# = &RUN_CTV# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV# = &RUN_AUSLOESER_CTV# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV# = &RUN_GENERATOR_CTV# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER_CTV# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV# = &RUN_BEARBEITER_CTV# !**************End of GeneratedText************** :IF &BILANZMONAT# = "" : SET &MONAT# = STR_CUT(&DATUM_AM#,5,2) : PSET &BILANZMONAT# = "&MONAT#" :ENDIF :IF &BILANZJAHR# = "" : SET &JAHR# = STR_CUT(&DATUM_AM#,1,4) : PSET &BILANZJAHR# = "&JAHR#" :ENDIF :PSET &VALUTA# = LAST_OF_PERIOD ("&BILANZJAHR#&BILANZMONAT#01", "MM", "JJJJMMTT")
:PSET &PARALLEL_DEFAULT# = GET_VAR("VARA.CONFIG_EBENE", "PARALLEL_DEFAULT") :IF &PARALLEL# = "" : PSET &PARALLEL# = "&PARALLEL_DEFAULT#" :ENDIF
:IF &PARENT# = "JOBP" : PSET &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# = "-1" :ENDIF
:IF &KOLLEKTIVNUMMER# = "" : STOP MSG, 50, "-> Kein Wert für Kollektivnummer eingegeben!" :ENDIF
